column5: Such pretty fish... 40" specimen caught last Sunday.        And here's a nice clean open water trolling fish caught the weekend before. One of the hardest hits I have ever had... I cleared weeds off my crankbait... let it back out, gave the rod a tug and WHAM it literally almost hit me in the face! As witnessed by Gallie!
Beauties Pete...
Always good to see late season fish. Thanks for sharing Pete.
Wow beauty colours!
Those tigers are awesome!! Never got one myself!!  S.
Wow. Beauties Pete. Glad to see you are doing well.
Jealous Nice shootin!
Beauties!!!!  Congrats!  Nature sure has a paintbrush!!!
Sweet tiger pete! That trolling hit was awesome! Looked like a westbound lure got hit but an eastbound train! That was a fun day looking forward to the next one.
Nice tiger  Never caught one myself...  And sweet troller fish...
Nice looking fish...especially the Tiger Muskie - I always find them neat looking.
That is a super pretty fish. Good for you, man.  Still haven't tied into one of those. Hopefully one day.
Gorgeous Ski's.  Love the Tiger
Nice boyz well done
Tiger ...   you didn't mention there were more pretty pics       Never caught a tiger ...  maybe someday ...  some place.
Thanks for sharing. I've got to start fishing tiger waters.
Those are a couple of nice looking fish!
Great fish!
nicely done!!
that's your "first" tiger of the year, most guys never see a tiger in their lifetime  putting big fish in the boat as usual Pete, very cool!
god, Tiger is official bucket list update for me...i need a 40 and to make a mount...i swear they are the most badass looking fish in the world.
